snippet: Antonio Bolfo started taking pictures at work while he was a New York City police officer. Before long, he turned in his badge. His photos were published Friday on the Lens blog.
abstract: Antonio Bolfo started taking pictures at work while he was a New York City police officer. Before long, he turned in his badge. His photos were published Friday on the Lens blog.
lead_paragraph: It is rare for a photographer to catch New York police officers looking so comfortable on camera. But Antonio Bolfo - whose photographs are featured today on the Lens blog - doesn't have a typical résumé. He was once a cop himself.

headline.main: He Traded His Badge for a Lens
